transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi Vishal.
Customer: Hello ha boliye good afternoon sir.
Executive: Vishal baat kar raha hu India Mart se baat ho sakti hai aap se.
Customer: Ha boliye sir ji.
Executive: Okay okay sir main ye keh raha tha maine apne senior se discuss kiya hai sir theek hai jo concern tha uske regarding to as per the company hum uske against me bhi action le rahe hai sir.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Theek hai baki as per company sir jo hum uske against me action le rahe hai sir as per policy jo bhi rehta hai sir theek hai theek hai baki as present sir maine jo aapka account manager hai wo bhi kisi aur person ko bhi assign kar diya hai jo ki aapka take care karenge service ke liye sir aapko unse koi bhi discuss karni ho mujhse karni ho mera number to yahi hai aap mujhe isse connect kar sakte hai jab chaho sir.
Customer: Hello theek hai sir ji aap ek kam kijiye a jaiye idhar baat karte hai apan theek hai company me a jaiye baat karte hai.
Executive: Sir main Noida se baat kar raha hu sir visit karna.
Customer: Ha to a jaiye na company me sir.
Executive: Kya hua sir main to Noida se baat kar raha hu sir aap mujhe aane ke liye kyu keh rahi hai sir aur wo to bilkul bhi possible bhi nahi ho sakta.
Customer: Kyunki tumhare dimag me ja nahi raha hai main kya bola tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo to aapko samajh me nahi aa raha hai aur kuch nahi iski vajah se.
Executive: Had to internal hai sir company kar rahi hai uske upar action sir.
Customer: To kar dijiye aap aapke hisab se jo bhi hai theek hai.
Executive: Ha to main fir ye keh raha tha ye concern yaha par close kar du aapka.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi hoga close.
Executive: Sir aapne jo request raise kari hai uske against me hi.
Customer: Nahi hoga close.
Executive: A bataiye main kya aur help kar sakta hu sir isme se.
Customer: Nahi hoga close main ek hi ek hi sawal ka 10 bari jawab nahi de sakta hu teen din din wahi jawab nahi de sakta hu main theek hai.
Executive: Chalo main aapko connect karwata hu sir apne senior se sir.
Customer: Abhi nahi karna hai main aapko kal hi kya bola tha.
Executive: Ha to maine aapne bola tha sir uske against me hum action le rahe hai sir.
Customer: Main kya action bola tha.
Executive: Action le rahe hai.
Customer: Kya action bola tha main.
Executive: Ha aapne nikalne ke liye bola hai sir to internally hamari company uske upar work kar rahi hai aur kar rahi hai sir.
Customer: Is concern pe hum already main kya bola tha sir aap kya kar rahe ho isse mujhe kya lena dena main customer mujhe kya chahiye us hisab se hoga uske baad me main kya bola tha aapko uske baad me kya bola tha maine aapko aakhir me phone rakhne se pehle.
Executive: Vishal sir main aapki sari request accept kar raha hu.
Customer: Sir mere muh se abhi wapis gali nikal jayega sir.
Executive: Aap bhi wahi kar rahe ho na.
Customer: Nahi sir main to normal bas aapke sath.
Executive: Main kya bol raha tha aapko kal maine kya bola tha aapko.
Customer: Sir aapne mujhe bola tha ki us ladke ko nikal dijiye maine already management se iske liye discuss kar liya hai ye hamari company ka internal hai na.
Executive: Main kya bola tha aapko call back ka maine aapko kya bola tha.
Customer: Ki aap mujhe phone mat karega jab tak aap usko nikalenge nahi sir correct.
Executive: Ha fir par sir main sir yaha par job kar raha hu jo meri duty hai main wo complete kar raha hu.
Customer: Ha theek hai to ye concern close mat kijiye unko boliye ki wo nahi sun rahe kal hi bola tha na maine ki nikal rahe ho to fir call karo nahi nikal rahe ho to mat karo senior ko phone karna hai to unko karne do.
Executive: Theek hai sir main inform kar dunga.
Customer: Ek hi cheez 100 bar pata nahi padti hai kya tum logo ko ha.
Executive: Theek hai main main inform kar dunga.
Customer: Nokar hai kya be tumhare yaha pe.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa kyu keh rahi ho sir.
Customer: Fir.
Executive: Main inform kar deta hu sir.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants the executive to remove employee.

- Customer does not want call backs.



Resolution:

- Executive informed action is being taken.

- Executive will inform about the concern.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- removal, callback, action
